The only problem is that, at least as far as I can tell, neither seem to express or even harbor any sort of feelings of endearment for each other. I won't deny those connections between licht, tetia, yuno, and mimosa, but the ways things are currently it would feel like a forced 180 for both of their characters. Depending on how long the series goes on for, there's still plenty of time for a relationship to start being developed between them, especially after what happened in the latest chapter. Yuno cried for time since he was a kid. That is a huge development, because it means going forward Yuno will likely no longer be bottling up his emotions and will be expressing them more freely. So far Mimosa has only seen one side of Yuno, the cold and distant side that doesn't seem to care about anything, but if he starts to become more emotional and openly express care for others, that might make her start to view Yuno in a different light. Girls are more attracted to guys who are sensitive and in touch with their emotions than they are to those who don't show any. In reality they would find guys like Yuno boring, but if Yuno starts to have more of a personality and showing emotion then he will no longer seem like such a boring person to be around, and Mimosa may start to find him attractive and desirable as a result.
